Taking orders on Whatsapp works fine. Zottr makes it Work Better

Zottr helps you go beyond chats create a modern online store, manage orders and promote your brand across WhatsApp and more.

Try Zottr Now Its Free!

Design It Your Way. Manage Easily.
Sell Like A Pro.

Your Own Store Address

Promote your business by just sharing a simple, recognizable store URL.

Customize Your Store

Pick color themes & layouts that best suit your business type & brand.

Provide Offers & Discounts

FLAT 200 OFF, 50% OFF, 1+1 Offer, and much more.

Run Everything On Whatsapp

Automatic order updates, store promotions, chat with customers.

Pay via UPI

Why pay payment gateway fees when you can simply use UPI or cash for free?

Build Stunning Stores.

Why should big brands have all the fancy tools? Zottr brings the same power to your phone. Whether you sell sarees, pickles, or home-made candles, you get :

Your own store link

Get a customized URL like yourstore.zottr.com ready to share with the world.

Simply pay via UPI

Use UPI or Cash. Forget those payment gateway charges.

Cuztomize your store

Cloth shop? bakery? Choose a "look & feel" that best suits your business.

Track Orders & Stock Easily

Better than tracking chat messages from multiple customers.

100% Managed on WhatsApp

Track orders & communicate with your customers simply using Whatsapp.

Don't just sell products, Build Your Brand with Zottr

Whether youre just starting your business or already killing it on WhatsApp & Instagram Zottr gives you the tools to grow, without the complexity of other platforms.
